## Education

- Ph.D. in Statistics, University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill. 2006--2011

- B.S. in Statistics, Seoul National University. 1999--2003


## Academic appointments

* Department of Statistics, Seoul National University 
     + Professor, 2022--
     + Associate Professor, 2018--2022.
     
* Institute for Data Innovation in Science, Seoul National University
     + Director, 2024--
     
* Department of Statistics, University of Pittsburgh
     + Associate Professor (tenured), 2017-2018.
     + Assistant Professor, 2011--2017.

     
## Research Interest

- Modern Multivariate Statistics 
- High-dimension, low-sample-size (HDLSS) analysis
- Statistics for unconventional, non-Euclidean, manifold-valued and/or multi-sourced data 
- Data privacy
